column4: <^Ocean^> I purged the fucking ting        Would you care to discuss it in PM
Sorry channel.. I meant for that to go in PM to him

Did you get that running the command I linked

problems are 59, 60, 68,69,70..  Using debian repos can break your system badly...
ok after I remove them what do I do?
